name: Local UP
description: A MERN stack application to help connect local small businesses looking for technology help, with fresh graduated developers looking to gain experience.

name: Santa's Bag
description: A intuitive app to help with planning gifts for your loved ones during the holiday season. You can add your loved ones and specify a budget for each person and get help with finding the right gifts.

name: Googly~BookWorm
description: A React JS based Google Book Search App. Users can save books to their bookshelves, and can query, review and purchase as per their desire.

name: Plan-eat-arium
description: Dine-in helper application that helps you plan your weekly menu item, by searching with ingredients and saving the recipes into your weekly calendar for future retrieval.

name: Me Want da Burger
description: A restaurant app to track user's Burger order and mark them as devoured when the order is fulfilled.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A intuitive Weather App that features smart search option to look up current and 5-day weather forecast.

name: Quiz Master
description: A Visual quiz game for young kids, who are intersted in birds. App has placeholder to add additional types of quiz games in the future.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: A Day Scheduler app allows users to save events for each hour of the day and be able to persist and retrieve and edit in the future.

name: Note Taker App
description: An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This will help the user with organizing their thoughts and keep track of thier tasks.
